keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The Jeep model involved in the death of the actor over the weekend has had a gearshift problem previously identified by federal regulators.

headline.print_headline: The Death of an Actor Highlights a Jeep Issue
headline.main: Anton Yelchin’s Death Highlights a Known Issue With Jeeps

snippet: The Jeep model involved in the death of the actor over the weekend has had a gearshift problem previously identified by federal regulators.
abstract: Death of Anton Yelchin, possibly due to defect in electronic gearshift of Jeep Grand Cherokee, refocuses spotlight on problem with some models of Jeeps and other cars manufactured by Fiat Chrysler; company told federal regulators that it had possible solution in March but has yet to release remedy.
